embed.description: This is the voice for the new Champion, Ekko Note: The Voice might not be final, you never know what tweaks Riot might make to it. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

replies.body:
he HAD a crush,BEFORE she started talking to the guns
although im not sure how past participle works with this guy..

> [{quoted}](name=POPPYINTENSIFIES,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-13T20:38:20.019+0000)
>
> he HAD a crush,BEFORE she started talking to the guns
> although im not sure how past participle works with this guy..

He does seem a bit upset about it.  Not sure if it's because he was 'replaced' by a gun (in Jinx's affections), or if he's sorry to see how she turned out.  I approve of there being a history there, though!

(Standard disclaimer: I'm not a narrative-team person - I know about the same as any other player!)

Kinda makes you wonder what happened between the three that left Vi not remembering a parts of her past, sent Jinx spiraling in to delusional mania, and left Ekko with time-travelling techmaturgy and some bitter memories.

EDIT: Just realised something. Even if Ekko was a kid when he was in the gang, kids can still have crushes and admire their higher ups. Perhaps they weren't as close as we think, but were still a part of the same gang.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=000000020001,timestamp=2015-05-13T22:03:57.066+0000)
>
> Kinda makes you wonder what happened between the three that left Vi not remembering a parts of her past, sent Jinx spiraling in to delusional mania, and left Ekko with time-travelling techmaturgy and some bitter memories.
> 
> EDIT: Just realised something. Even if Ekko was a kid when he was in the gang, kids can still have crushes and admire their higher ups. Perhaps they weren't as close as we think, but were still a part of the same gang.

I wonder what their 'happier times' were like.  

Also, I personally didn't think that Jinx was particularly old, or that Ekko was particularly young.  And hell, I'm sure that mucking around with time can ruin any sensible persons ability to gauge age.  (Just look at Timelords, after all!)

Oh yeah time-wobbly weirdness can skew the perspective of age to obscene degrees. In truth all we really know concerning the ages of these three is that Jinx is older than Vi, and even that doesn't say a lot, because older can be anywhere from weeks to months to year!

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=00000002000100000001,timestamp=2015-05-13T22:31:32.290+0000)
>
> Oh yeah time-wobbly weirdness can skew the perspective of age to obscene degrees. In truth all we really know concerning the ages of these three is that Jinx is older than Vi, and even that doesn't say a lot, because older can be anywhere from weeks to months to year!

I think I found the [comment that you might be referencing from RiotRansom](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1no2gi/we_are_the_jinx_team_ama/cckcym5) in the Jinx AMA.  He describes Jinx as _slightly_ older than Vi.  It's incredible what a difference a grown up attitude can make in how old people are perceived.

With Vi's stature, I'd guess she's right at 18-19-20, she is still a real tomboy and the way she laughs and picks on people with her VO makes it clear she's not some totally grown up character yet. Place Ekko at something like 15-16-17 (allowing for distortion in his age via time travel), and he could easily have been friends with Jinx and Vi as a child, and it wouldn't be out of the question for him to have feelings for jinx in a normal timeframe (who obviously didn't notice her young friend and thus somehow fell more in love with guns than anything else).

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=0000000200010000000100000001,timestamp=2015-05-14T00:42:18.324+0000)
>
> With Vi's stature, I'd guess she's right at 18-19-20, she is still a real tomboy and the way she laughs and picks on people with her VO makes it clear she's not some totally grown up character yet. Place Ekko at something like 15-16-17 (allowing for distortion in his age via time travel), and he could easily have been friends with Jinx and Vi as a child, and it wouldn't be out of the question for him to have feelings for jinx in a normal timeframe (who obviously didn't notice her young friend and thus somehow fell more in love with guns than anything else).

It's kind of funny how much perceptions of age can vary. The idea of Vi being 18 years old just seems completely bizarre to me. I do think that people's ages tend to significantly affect their views of age. I made my first roleplay character (well, one of my first) when I was like 12. I wanted the character to be "a grown-up", as in, a clearly mature adult. As a 12-year-old, I decided that 18 would work for an obviously adult age. It seemed very reasonable at the time. Now, when I think "18 year old", I think "college freshman" or "tiny baby-person".

That said, if two people both agree that Lux is supposed to be "somewhat young", with youth as one of her themes, I'm not sure it really matters if one person translates that as "so she's maybe 25" and the other person translates that as "so she's like 16". When I was 13, I thought 18-year-olds were "grown-ups", because hey, they could go to college, and as far as I was concerned, anyone going to college was clearly a grown-up. Then, shortly after I graduated college, some friends and I were talking about how weird it was to see college freshmen walking around: "it's like, I want to ask them if their parents know where they are. They look so tiny." Not meant to be offensive; if anything, perhaps slightly envious. But mostly, it's just weird how perception of age changes over time.
I have to agree, Vi strikes me as early or mid 20s at the very least.

I'm just guessing 18-20 based on her general immaturity despite her adult build, which reminds me of several people I know that are within that age range. In fact, I also thought "college Freshman" when deciding how old I thought she was.

Not to mention a grown-up figure...

Also slightly could still mean anywhere from weeks to months to years.
Kinda hard to guess the age of a time traveler though

Didnt we have her designer come of the forums when she(jynx) was released and say she was late 20s or very early 30s?

Considering how young echo looks that could be double his age at the high end

> [{quoted}](name=Kaosu Desu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=00000002000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T22:31:28.901+0000)
>
> Didnt we have her designer come of the forums when she(jynx) was released and say she was late 20s or very early 30s?
> 
> Considering how young echo looks that could be double his age at the high end

That's hardly relevant to a teenager's boy crush.

Also, look at Jinx, I really doubt she'd consider age to be a factor in her relationships (as long as they can withstand bullets and explosions).

but that is there current ages. there seems to be at least 5+ years of theroical history going on in piltover. That would drop ekko to preteen. 

The ages are not meshing if ekko age is correct and if jynx is as old as the dev originally said.
maybe Ekko has the same dissease as Zilean?

That's ok. 

If you WERE a narrative-type person, you wouldn't be saying a single god-damned thing in these boards.
I'm going to assume she just went crazy and he found it less attractive. How old is he? I'm guessing 15 at least.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-05-13T21:40:40.176+0000)
>
> He does seem a bit upset about it.  Not sure if it's because he was 'replaced' by a gun (in Jinx's affections), or if he's sorry to see how she turned out.  I approve of there being a history there, though!
> 
> (Standard disclaimer: I'm not a narrative-team person - I know about the same as any other player!)

I would have to say that he is upset that he was replaced by a gun (In Jinx's affections) because think about it put yourself in his shoes, your a guy who likes this girl and you two are close and you really like each other than she "replaces" you with an object, you would be pretty pissed off about wouldn't you.
How about both? It'd be a little more understandable emotional wise.
So Jinx wasn't always crazy. Thats good to know, lol.
It explains why I see her face on the left in the moral. She went crazy in Zaun for some reason. It must all relate to that boy who supposedly died.
{{champion:29}} ekko I have missed you {{item:3070}}
https://youtu.be/zCLJU1z8Cw4?t=58
I also like the comment to Lucian, "I really hope you're not the future me". What's wrong, Ekko, you don't like guns either?

> [{quoted}](name=Battleborn Sovi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dLzrGMjX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-13T21:37:54.695+0000)
>
> I also like the comment to Lucian, "I really hope you're not the future me". What's wrong, Ekko, you don't like guns either?

I actually thought those lines were for Zilean.
Time fight!

I think something like that relates more to him having a former crush on Jinx and a friendship with Vi. The main woman in Lucian's life died. What would happen to Ekko if that were to happen with the women who may be important to him?

Also are those lines specifically for Lucian? I assumed when first hearing them they were Ekko interacting with another Ekko, because time craziness and mirror matchups.
it might be just lines for a mirror match ekko
probably a mix of that and also he seems to be a bit laid back and not someone who wants to deal with anymore sad stories in his life and Lucian if nothing else has sad stories.
Did riot just sink my shaco x jinx battleship?
That ship never made it out of dry dock.

I swear I wasn't the first one to come of up this. Ik there were other posts suggesting as much. Yet im left scratching my head as to where all the cruise riders went.
Jumped ship I guess, id rather sink with it
http://i.imgur.com/aiiR262.gif
times like these are when I regret not knowing how2gif. TY for it and if I could a would've posted a sinking ship
Ekko is too young for Jinx. He should watch out for Headmistress Fiora on the other hand.

Time-manipulating techmaturgy son.

Who knows how old he really is, how many lives he's lived.

>

My personal theory is that there was some kind of timeskip related to his time travel device. This would explain the age difference and go pretty well as his lore.

so my theory (that's all it is)
Whatever accident that caused vi to lose her memories caused jinx to go insane,
so what happened?
i believe a piltover character caused the accident, hence why ekko hates the piltans, and why jinx flipping wreaks piltover in the first place. also from my guess, jinx went crazy because of the accident, and by my guess, ptsd on what happened to vi. jinx attacks and taunts vi because they probably had a love-hate relationship in their gang. hence "fathands" would be just poking at her instead of an outright insult. ekko and jinx could have been best friends or more, but because of the accident she was triggered (pun intended).
